price: “Isaan miidhaa dalagan, hiriyoota (fakkaatoo) isaaniitiifi waan isaan gabbaraa turanis walitti qabaa” (malaykotaan jedhama.)
arabic: ۞ ٱحۡشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزۡوَٰجَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: uḥ'shurū alladhīna ẓalamū wa-azwājahum wamā kānū yaʿbudūna
